# StringExtensions.Mid method

Returns a string that contains a specified number of characters from the specified position.

```csharp
public static string Mid(this string str, int start, int length)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| str | Name of the variable String to be modified. |
| start | Position of the character where the extraction starts |
| length | Number of characters to be extracted. |

## Return Value

A String with the result.
